mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(mat_no) FROM m_in WHERE mat_no=#{matNo}
SELECT COUNT(store_no) FROM m_in WHERE store_no=#{storeNo}

SELECT ep.ep_id, ep.mat_code, ep.mat_name, ep.mat_unit, ep.erp_type, ep.mat_amount, ep.mat_price, ep.center_no, ep.type_name, ep.request, ep.remark, ep.creator, (ep.mat_price*ep.mat_amount) mat_bala, ep.purchase_no, ep.create_date, ep.mat_addr, IFNULL(mi.amount,0) amount, IFNULL(ap.applyed, 0) applyed, ep.item_type, (SELECT center_name FROM t_cost_center WHERE center_no=ep.center_no) as center_name FROM m_ep_plan ep LEFT JOIN (SELECT reserve_no, SUM(bill_amount) amount FROM m_in WHERE bill_date>=#{beginDate} AND bill_date<=#{occDate} AND in_step='7201F' GROUP BY reserve_no) mi ON ep.ep_id=mi.reserve_no LEFT JOIN (SELECT reserve_no, SUM(in_amount) applyed FROM m_in WHERE in_date>=#{beginDate} AND in_date<=#{occDate} AND in_step IN ('72011', '72012') GROUP BY reserve_no) ap ON ep.ep_id=ap.reserve_no WHERE ep.create_date LIKE CONCAT(#{monthQry}, '%') AND (ep.mat_amount - IFNULL(mi.amount, 0) - IFNULL(ap.applyed, 0) > 0.0001)
AND ep.mat_code LIKE CONCAT(#{codeQry}, '%')
AND (ep.purchase_no LIKE CONCAT(#{purcQry}, '%') OR ep.ep_id LIKE CONCAT(#{purcQry}, '%'))
AND CONCAT(ep.erp_type, ep.type_name) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{typeQry}, '%')
AND ep.mat_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nameQry}, '%')
AND IFNULL(mi.amount, 0)=0
AND (ep.mat_amount-IFNULL(mi.amount, 0)) > 0 AND IFNULL(mi.amount, 0)!=0
AND (ep.mat_amount-IFNULL(mi.amount, 0)) <= 0

SELECT ep.center_no, cc.center_name, ap.process_name in_step_name, s.store_name, i.apply_date, i.apply_amount, u.user_name apply_emp_name, i.bill_date, IFNULL(u1.user_name, '') bill_emp, i.reserve_no, i.bill_amount, i.bill_amount*i.set_price bala, o.offer_name, i.bill_no FROM m_in i LEFT JOIN m_ep_plan ep ON ep.ep_id=i.reserve_no LEFT JOIN t_cost_center cc ON ep.center_no=cc.center_no LEFT JOIN m_store s ON s.store_no=i.store_no LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.uuid=i.apply_emp LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.uuid=i.bill_emp LEFT JOIN m_offer o ON o.offer_no=i.offer_no LEFT JOIN sys_audit_process ap ON ap.process_no=i.in_step WHERE i.in_step NOT IN ('7201F', '7201X', '7201Z') AND i.in_type='r.inBillType.1'

SELECT i.*, u.user_name apply_emp_name, m.mat_code, m.mat_name, m.mat_unit, m.erp_type, m.type_name, ap.process_name in_step_name, ((CASE WHEN IFNULL(i.bill_amount, 0)=0 THEN i.in_amount ELSE i.bill_amount END)*i.set_price) bala, di.text in_type_name FROM m_in i LEFT JOIN m_material m ON i.mat_no=m.mat_no LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.uuid=i.apply_emp LEFT JOIN sys_audit_process ap ON ap.process_no=i.in_step LEFT JOIN sys_dic_item di ON di.value=i.in_type WHERE i.data_src='m.dataSrc.1' AND i.in_type='r.inBillType.2' AND i.in_date>=#{startDateQry} AND i.in_date<=#{endDateQry} AND EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM sys_user_store WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND store_no=i.store_no)
AND m.mat_code+m.mat_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{matQry}, '%')
AND i.store_no=#{storeNoQry}
ORDER BY i.in_date DESC

SELECT COUNT(i.apply_date) count, i.apply_date, i.in_type, i.store_no, i.in_step, s.store_name, ap.process_name in_step_name, di.text in_type_name FROM m_in i LEFT JOIN m_store s ON s.store_no=i.store_no LEFT JOIN sys_audit_process ap ON ap.process_no=i.in_step LEFT JOIN sys_dic_item di ON di.value=i.in_type WHERE in_step IN ('72011', '72012') AND data_src='m.dataSrc.1' AND i.store_no IN (SELECT store_no FROM sys_user_store WHERE user_id=#{userId}) GROUP BY i.apply_date, i.in_type, i.store_no, i.in_step, s.store_name, ap.process_name, di.text ORDER BY i.apply_date
SELECT i.*, m.qa_period FROM m_in i LEFT JOIN m_material m ON i.mat_no=m.mat_no WHERE i.bill_no=#{_parameter}

SELECT a.bill_no, a.set_price, a.store_no, (a.bill_amount + IFNULL(mb.bill_amount, 0) - IFNULL(a.out_amount,0)) bill_amount FROM m_in a LEFT JOIN m_in mb ON a.bill_no=mb.link_no WHERE a.in_step='7201F' AND (a.bill_amount + IFNULL(mb.bill_amount,0) - IFNULL(a.out_amount,0)) > 0 AND a.mat_no = #{matNo} AND a.store_no = #{storeNo} AND a.data_src = 'm.dataSrc.1' ORDER BY a.bill_no ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE m_in SET out_amount=IFNULL(out_amount, 0)+#{outAmount} WHERE bill_no=#{billNo}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(bill_amount), 0) bill_amount FROM m_in WHERE plan_no=#{_parameter} AND in_step='7701F'

SELECT a.*, b.mat_code, b.mat_name, b.mat_unit, st.store_name, ap.process_name in_step_name, o.text offer_team_name, ((CASE WHEN a.bill_amount=0 THEN a.in_amount ELSE a.bill_amount END) * a.set_price) mat_bala, ((CASE WHEN a.bill_amount=0 THEN a.in_amount ELSE a.bill_amount END) * a.price1) fix_bala FROM m_in a LEFT JOIN m_material b ON a.mat_no=b.mat_no LEFT JOIN sys_audit_process ap ON ap.process_no=a.in_step LEFT JOIN sys_organization o ON o.id=a.offer_team LEFT JOIN m_store st ON a.store_no=st.store_no WHERE a.team_no=#{userTeam} AND a.data_src='m.dataSrc.A' AND a.apply_date>=#{date1Qry} AND a.apply_date<=#{date2Qry} AND a.in_type = 'r.inBillType.A'
AND a.in_step=#{stepQry}
AND (b.mat_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{matQry}, '%') OR b.mat_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{matQry}, '%'))
ORDER BY a.bill_no DESC

SELECT a.*, b.mat_code, b.mat_name, b.mat_unit, st.store_name, p.process_name in_step_name, o.text team_name, ((CASE WHEN a.bill_amount=0 THEN a.in_amount ELSE a.bill_amount END) * a.set_price) mat_bala, ((CASE WHEN a.bill_amount=0 THEN a.in_amount ELSE a.bill_amount END) * a.price1) fix_bala FROM m_in a LEFT JOIN m_material b ON a.mat_no=b.mat_no LEFT JOIN sys_audit_process p ON p.process_no=a.in_step LEFT JOIN sys_organization o ON o.id=a.team_no LEFT JOIN m_store st ON a.store_no=st.store_no WHERE a.apply_date>=#{date1Qry} AND a.apply_date<=#{date2Qry} AND a.in_step IN ('77013', '77017') AND a.in_type = 'r.inBillType.A' AND EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM sys_user_step us LEFT JOIN sys_audit_process ap ON ap.uuid=us.step_uuid WHERE ap.process_no=a.in_step AND us.user_id=#{userId}) AND ( a.in_step='77013' AND a.offer_team=#{userTeam} OR a.in_step='77017' )
AND (b.mat_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{matQry}, '%') OR b.mat_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{matQry}, '%'))
ORDER BY a.bill_no ASC

SELECT a.*, b.mat_code, b.mat_name, b.mat_unit, st.store_name, p.process_name in_step_name, o.text team_name, o1.text offer_team_name, ((CASE WHEN a.bill_amount=0 THEN a.in_amount ELSE a.bill_amount END) * a.set_price) mat_bala, ((CASE WHEN a.bill_amount=0 THEN a.in_amount ELSE a.bill_amount END) * a.price1) fix_bala FROM m_in a LEFT JOIN m_material b ON a.mat_no=b.mat_no LEFT JOIN m_store st ON a.store_no=st.store_no LEFT JOIN sys_audit_process p ON p.process_no=a.in_step LEFT JOIN sys_organization o ON o.id=a.team_no LEFT JOIN sys_organization o1 ON o1.id=a.offer_team WHERE a.out_team=#{userTeam} AND a.apply_date>=#{date1Qry} AND a.apply_date<=#{date2Qry} AND a.in_step='77015'
AND (b.mat_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{matQry}, '%') OR b.mat_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{matQry}, '%'))
ORDER BY a.bill_no ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE m_in SET bill_amount=in_amount, in_step=#{inStep}, bill_date=#{billDate}, bill_emp=#{billEmp}, check_addr=#{checkAddr} WHERE bill_no=#{billNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.*, b.mat_code, b.mat_name, b.mat_unit, (SELECT store_name FROM m_store WHERE store_no=a.store_no) store_name, (SELECT prj_name FROM m_prj WHERE prj_no=a.norm_no) prj_name, di.text plan_src_name, o.text offer_team_name FROM m_in a LEFT JOIN m_material b ON a.mat_no=b.mat_no LEFT JOIN sys_dic_item di ON di.value=a.plan_src LEFT JOIN sys_organization o ON o.id=a.offer_team WHERE a.data_src='m.dataSrc.A' AND a.in_step NOT IN ('77010', '7701F', '7701X') AND a.in_type='r.inBillType.B' AND EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM sys_user_step us LEFT JOIN sys_audit_process ap ON ap.uuid=us.step_uuid WHERE ap.process_no=a.in_step AND us.user_id=#{userNo}) AND ( a.in_step='77013' AND a.offer_team=#{userTeam} OR a.in_step='77015' AND EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM sys_user_store WHERE store_no=a.store_no AND user_id=#{userNo}) OR a.in_step='77017' )
AND CONCAT(b.mat_code, b.mat_name) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{matQry}, '%')
AND a.store_no=#{storeQry}
ORDER BY a.in_date DESC

SELECT a.*, b.mat_code, b.mat_name, b.mat_unit, (SELECT store_name FROM m_store WHERE store_no=a.store_no) store_name, p.process_name in_step_name, di.text in_type_name, di1.text plan_src_name, o.text teamName, o1.text offer_team_name, IFNULL(o2.text, '') offer_name FROM m_in a LEFT JOIN m_material b ON a.mat_no=b.mat_no LEFT JOIN sys_audit_process p ON p.process_no=a.in_step LEFT JOIN sys_dic_item di ON di.value=a.in_type LEFT JOIN sys_dic_item di1 ON di1.value=a.plan_src LEFT JOIN sys_organization o ON o.id=a.team_no LEFT JOIN sys_organization o1 ON o1.id=a.offer_team LEFT JOIN sys_organization o2 ON o2.id=a.offer_no WHERE a.data_src='m.dataSrc.A' AND a.apply_amount!=0 AND a.in_date>=#{date1Qry} AND a.in_date<=#{date2Qry} AND (a.team_no IN
#{deptId}
OR a.offer_team IN
#{deptId} )
AND a.in_type=#{typeQry}
AND CONCAT(b.mat_code, b.mat_name) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{matQry}, '%')
ORDER BY a.in_date DESC

SELECT a.*, c.mat_code, c.mat_name, c.mat_unit, (SELECT store_name FROM m_store WHERE store_no=a.store_no) store_name, p.process_name in_step_name, o.text offer_team_name, o1.text team_name, di.text in_type_name FROM m_in a INNER JOIN m_material c ON a.mat_no = c.mat_no LEFT JOIN sys_audit_process p ON p.process_no=a.in_step LEFT JOIN sys_organization o ON o.id=a.offer_team LEFT JOIN sys_organization o1 ON o1.id=a.team_no LEFT JOIN sys_dic_item di ON di.value=a.in_type WHERE a.in_step IN ('77013', '77015') AND a.data_src='m.dataSrc.B' AND a.apply_date >= #{date1Qry} AND a.apply_date <= #{date2Qry} AND EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM sys_user_step us LEFT JOIN sys_audit_process ap ON ap.uuid=us.step_uuid WHERE ap.process_no=a.in_step AND us.user_id=#{userNo}) AND ((a.in_step='77013' AND c.fix_content=#{userTeam}) OR a.in_step='77015' AND EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM sys_user_store WHERE user_id=#{userNo} AND store_no=a.store_no) )
